refnamediv.refpurpose: Open a connection to a MonetDB Server

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns a MonetDB link identifier on success, or &false; on failure.
monetdb_connect establishes a connection to a MonetDB server. The default parameter values are described in MonetDB configuration options

Please remember, that (unlike most other DBMSes) MonetDB supports a rich and extendable set of languages. That means, you should make sure the language you want to use is supported by the server you're connecting to.
After successfull connection to MonetDB server, the established link becomes a default parameter for all MonetDB functions, until another connection is open or monetdb_close is called.

example.title: monetdb_connect example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = monetdb_connect();
if (!$link) {
    die('Could not connect: ' . monetdb_error());
}
echo 'Connected successfully';
monetdb_close();
?>
